name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jira Service Desk - Move Reply to Customer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move the Reply to Customer button to the rightmost side of the container. Useful if you find the buttons are too close together.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For use in Jira Service Management Projects. 

The extension moves the Reply to Customer button to the rightmost side of the container. 

Useful if you find the buttons are too close together to prevent accidentally clicking the wrong one.
